title: If Elvis didn’t die in 1977, when do you think he did? - Quora

response.answer_text: My uncle who had at this time a small burger restaurant in Anchorage hired a rather fat guy with a signature haircut as short order cook. “He looked a lot like Elvis” he always said, “but no, elvis was dead, but sometimes, when I looked at him I wondered….” My uncle told me this guy could grill a mean burger and was always reliable and modest. And then, it was the 8. Januar 1985 when my uncle came early to the joint. He opened the door, and there were subdued accords from a guitar, and this guy just sat there, strumming the instrument and smiled. He nodded towards my uncle, shook his hand and left never to be seen again.
